Welcome to Smart Surveillance

 1. Introduction
 By using Smart Surveillance, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.


2. Service Description
 Smart Surveillance is a personal safety application that uses your device's sensors to detect potential accidents and notify emergency contacts.


3. User Responsibilities
 - You must provide accurate emergency contact information - You must obtain consent from people you list as emergency contacts - You should not rely solely on this app for emergency situations - You should maintain your device in proper working condition


4. Data Collection and Privacy
 We collect and process:
 - Location data - Sensor data (accelerometer, gyroscope) - Emergency contact information - Accident history
 This data is used solely for providing the service and is handled according to our privacy policy.


5. Emergency Contact Notifications
 - The app will attempt to notify your emergency contacts in case of detected accidents - We cannot guarantee message delivery or response from emergency contacts - False alarms may occur despite our best efforts to minimize them


6. Liability Limitations
 - The app is provided "as is" without warranties - We are not liable for any damages or injuries - The app is not a substitute for emergency services (911) - You should always call emergency services directly in life-threatening situations


7. Account Security
 - You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account - You must notify us of any unauthorized use of your account - We recommend enabling device security features


8. Service Availability
 - We strive for 24/7 availability but cannot guarantee uninterrupted service - Service may be affected by factors beyond our control (network coverage, device status)


9. Modifications
 We may modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the app constitutes acceptance of modified terms.


10. Termination
 We reserve the right to terminate service to any user who violates these terms.


By using Smart Surveillance, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to these terms.
